publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1098 Ms Sandra White: Asylum Seekers-That the Parliament notes the concerns raised at the meeting "Asylum Seekers Speak Out For Themselves" held in the Parliament on the experiences of asylum seekers and refugees, highlighting the poor living conditions and the lack of decent living facilities, interpreters and staff dedicated to work with and aid refugees, and calls upon the Scottish Executive and Her Majesty's Government to take urgent action to alleviate the poor conditions experienced by many refugees and to make contact with the agencies working with asylum seekers and refugees, to determine what action can be taken to alleviate their plight. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Tricia Marwick*, Fiona McLeod*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Richard Lochhead*, Irene McGugan*, Bruce Crawford*, Alex Neil*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Fergus Ewing*, Fiona Hyslop*, Michael Matheson*, Mr John Swinney*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr John Munro*, Donald Gorrie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Iain Smith*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Linda Fabiani*, Tommy Sheridan*, Alasdair Morgan*, Colin Campbell*, Kay Ullrich*
S1M-1098 Asylum Seekers (lodged on 6 July 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1098 Asylum Seekers (lodged on 6 July 2000) Malcolm Chisholm*, Brian Adam*
S1M-1098 Asylum Seekers (lodged on 6 July 2000) Robin Harper*

Supported by: Shona Robison, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Fiona McLeod, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan, Bruce Crawford, Alex Neil, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Dr Winnie Ewing, Mr Gil Paterson, Fergus Ewing, Fiona Hyslop, Michael Matheson, Mr John Swinney, Christine Grahame, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr John Munro, Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Iain Smith, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Linda Fabiani, Tommy Sheridan, Alasdair Morgan, Colin Campbell, Kay Ullrich, Andrew Wilson, Malcolm Chisholm, Brian Adam, Robin Harper
